pr_title: Jakarta packages for the persistent executor

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested edit:
This feature enables the creation of persistent scheduled executors that allow applications 
to schedule persistent tasks that run with a thread context that is managed by the application server.
timeline.author: dmuelle

replies.bodyText: This description was copied from the corresponding v1.0 feature, so I'm fixing it as you suggest in both places. Please see d58aee9 for the change
replies.author: njr-11
